title: You know this game sucks when...
body: You play a game without AFK'ing you finish the game then randomly get 5 20 min queues o.O the only time ive afked in the past week was in a bot game with friends

replies.body: You know this game sucks when.. people instalock, disconnect, afk or just be a troll it ruins the fun for the game.

You know the game sucks when you get matched with me in ranked

EEEEEELLLOOOOOO HEEEEELLLLLL
